survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of fitness apps to understand their satisfaction, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which fitness app do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture apps not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a dropdown menu for this question to save space.

script.question_text: Which fitness app do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the fitness app?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover all possible usage frequencies.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use the fitness app?

questions.question_text: What features do you use most frequently in the app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all frequently used features.

script.question_text: What features do you use most frequently in the app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the app?

questions.question_text: What do you like most about the fitness app you use?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question will provide qualitative insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What do you like most about the fitness app you use?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the app?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question will highlight areas for enhancement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the app?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this app to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this app to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: Do you use the premium/paid version of the app?
questions.client_notes: This will help segment responses between free and paid users.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Do you use the premium/paid version of the app?

questions.question_text: If you use the premium version, what motivated you to upgrade?
questions.client_notes: Only show this question to premium users.

script.question_text: If you use the premium version, what motivated you to upgrade?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the app?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question will help identify potential new features.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the app?
